title: Why I Killed Jamie St. Claire
description: It's 1851 and Jade Fairfax is living the charmed life as the only child of a lord who owns the entire village close to their estate. That is it was charmed until Jamie St. Claire enters her life and he ends up dead at her hands. Jamie is (or was?) charming, beautiful, the son of the poor shopkeeper in the village and the boy who brings Jade's world crashing down around her. That doesn't stop Jamie from getting everyone who meets him to eat out of the palm of his hand. It's this manipulation that drives Jade to madness through her undying love for the boy that only knows how to break hearts.Told from the point of view of Jade as she explains why she murdered the boy that owns her heart this is a story of love, revenge and paying the ultimate price to get what you always wanted and deserved.
author: Melody Dormant
